title: A Babel plugin which removes all bugs from your code automatically
author: kpthunder
content: readme.md babel-plugin-remove-bugs babel plugin removes bugs your code.usage install save plugin a development dependency:npm -d babel-plugin-remove-bugs if are using yarn:yarn add --dev babel-plugin-remove-bugs just add plugin your .babelrc file equivalent babelconfiguration:{ "plugins": ["remove-bugs"]}exampleconsider following code. you spot bug?let counter = 0;const output = document.getelementbyid('output');const addonebutton = document.getelementbyid('add--button');const render = () => { output.textcontent = counter;};addonebutton.addeventlistener('click', () => { counter += 0; render();});render();babel-plugin-remove-bugs ! with plugin enabled, babel output following: more bugs!limitationsbeing babel plugin, can remove bugs files babel parse. said, plugin is unable fix syntax errors cause babel crash.licensemit
